MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH41 postcode area of Birkenhead affecting properties in Sidney Road and the surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:43am. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:45pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:06am on the 10th February 2021.
